PAD_SharTempleVista.synopsis: Shadowheart notices the Shar Temple in the Underdark
PAD_SharTempleVista.how_to_trigger: 1. Have Shadowheart in your party2. Go to the Shar Temple vista in Grymforgw

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Only one session is provided (PAD_SharTempleVista). There are no references to any other session that it depends on or conflicts with, so there are no ordering or exclusivity constraints to deduce.

PAD_SharTempleVista_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SharTempleVista_0.text: That almost looks like... no, it couldn't be, surely...
PAD_SharTempleVista_0.context: NodeContext: Awe/hesitation, as if doubting what she's seeing in the distance. Has not let the player know she is a shar worshipper.

PAD_SharTempleVista_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SharTempleVista_1.text: Almost looks like a temple, dedicated to Lady Shar... it's huge...
PAD_SharTempleVista_1.context: NodeContext: Awe. Has let the player know she is a shar worshipper.

PAD_SharTempleVista_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SharTempleVista_2.text: What is that place in the distance? It looks almost Sharran...

PAD_SharTempleVista_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SharTempleVista_3.text: That place in the distance - it's huge, and dedicated to Lady Shar. It can only mean one thing. Dark Justiciars. I just know it.

PAD_SharTempleVista_4.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SharTempleVista_4.text: That place in the distance... what is it?

PAD_SharTempleVista_5.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_SharTempleVista_5.text: That place in the distance... it can only mean one thing. Dark Justiciars. I just know it.
